member.name: INFCONTEXT
member.summary: TheINFCONTEXT structure stores context information that functions such as use to navigate INF files.

member.name: INFCONTEXT.Inf
member.summary: Handle to the INF file returned by.

member.name: INFCONTEXT.CurrentInf
member.summary: Pointer to the current INF file. The Inf member may point to multiple files if they were appended to the open INF file using.

member.name: INFCONTEXT.Section
member.summary: Section in the current INF file.

summary.para: Line of the current section in the INF file.
summary.div: Note The setup functions use this structure internally and it must not be accessed or modified by applications. It is included here for informational purposes only.
